body: At 2nd level, a plains druid gains a bonus on initiative checks and Knowledge (geography), Perception, Stealth, and Survival checks equal to 1/2 her druid level in plains terrain, and she cannot be tracked in such an environment. This ability replaces woodland stride.
name: Plains Traveler
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Plains Druid/Plains Traveler
